Content:
This is a lovely event at the Woottens nursery. Lots of stall holders with a huge variety of plants and garden related goodies, including our wood and metal products.
We hope to see you there.
Location: The Iris Field, Hall Road, Wenhaston, Suffolk, IP19 9HF
Title: Woottens Spring Fayre

Content:
This is a great place to pick up some of the regular or more exotic plants for your garden, with a great range of stall holders. 

Well worth a visit and a walk around the beautiful gardens.
Title: Somerleyton Craft Fayre

Content: A well attended event with a large variety of stalls and some great family based entertainment, well worth a visit and a walk around the beautiful gardens.
Title: Somerleyton Autumn Craft Fayre

Content: This is a lovely event at the Woottens nursery, with a good range of stalls for all those garden related presents for yourself or family and friends.
Location: The Iris Field, Hall Road, Wenhaston, Suffolk, IP19 9HF
Title: Woottens Autumn Fayre
